title.narrative: POPs Legacy Elimination And POPs Release Reduction Project

description.narrative: This project was designed to address the issue of POPs legacies including elimination of POPs Pesticide and PCB stockpiles and initiating a clean-up of associated POPs and chemical pollutant contaminated sites. Another focus area of the project is the longer term PCB phase out that is consistent with Turkey's Stockholm Convention obligation, reducing U-POPs release in major industrial sectors and providing targeted institutional, regulatory and technical capacity strengthening within a sound chemicals management framework.
